alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 22 at 11:42AM MDT until May 25 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Lost River Valley and Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin zones. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.8 Mon 11 am MD 4.0 3.9 4.0 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ068-074-232200- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0007.230523T0709Z-230525T2200Z/ /HWRI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1142 AM MDT Mon May 22 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From late tonight to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Monday the stage was 3.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys
